hotels.description: Escape to an exceptional island paradise at this highly acclaimed Maldives resort, where you'll experience unmatched all-inclusive luxury. This exceptional escape offers a uniquely unparalleled experience and has been honoured as the Maldives' Leading All-Inclusive Resort 2024 by the World Travel Awards. Indulge at the onsite restaurants, including the sand-lined main dining room Lily Maa and trendy beach bars. Enjoy free-flow drinks and sip on a selection of imported Taittinger champagne or 80 premium wines from around the world, all while savouring spectacular gourmet cuisine. Plus, one child stays for free, making it a perfect choice for families. Transform your stay into a luxe playground in paradise and be spoiled by endless ways to fill your day. Stretch out alongside one of the shimmering pools, dip your toes in the translucent lagoon or explore an underwater world teeming with marine life. Find tranquillity with a peaceful yoga class or revitalise with a lavish treatment at the Tamara Spa.
